name: Remove Woocommerce Product Content
author: Geek Code Lab

sections.description:
By using this smart plugin, allows you to Hide product content from wooocommerce Single product page, Shop page and category page , no need to edit theme and woocommerce plugin!.

This Plugin integrates seamlessly with any WordPress Theme, and Admin can easily remove different content of product like price, thumbnail, product tab, add to cart button etc.

Free Plugin Features

Here are some customizations you can make:

👉 Single Product Page

🔹 Remove Flash Sale
🔹 Remove Product Price
🔹 Remove Short Description
🔹 Remove Categories
🔹 Remove Add to Cart Button
🔹 Remove Product Thumbnails
🔹 Remove Related Product
🔹 Remove Description Tab
🔹 Remove Review Tab
🔹 Remove Additional Information
🔹 Remove All Product Tabs

👉 Product List Page

🔹 Hide Sale Flash
🔹 Hide Rating
🔹 Hide Add to Cart
🔹 Hide Price
🔹 Hide Sale Price
🔹 Hide Variable Price

Any content from above you can easily hide and show easily from admin side.

This plugin provides a settings page where you can select your customize and save them without needing to write any code or modify any templates, which is helpful for quick change testing.

Note: This plugin may not work on the website which is made using builders like Elementor, Divi, etc. Because this plugin is based on woocommerce hooks and filters.

Pro Plugin Features

🔹 Users can Hide product content individually.
🔹 Admin can easily remove different content of product like price, thumbnail, product tab, add to cart button etc by Category.
🔹 Admin can easily remove different content of product like price, thumbnail, product tab, add to cart button etc by individual product.
🔹 User can hide product content by single product, category.

GET PRO PLUGIN

BUY NOW
sections.installation:
Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.

After active plugin go to Woocommerce->Adding Content to the Footer.

sections.reviews:
Doesn't works

By Skrlance (seanlance) on January 6, 2024

I am amazed to see that who give 5 star rating to this plugin that doesn't works at all and ranking on top on Google search when I was looking for this type of plugin.

Best Plugin

By suhail411 on June 20, 2020

One of the best plugins and does what they have shown, My client needed custom tabs instead of predefined tabs in woocommerce and for it I used this plugin, I removed all premade tabs and with the help of other plugin i created new tabs, but this plugin is awesome, thank you
